description: A server-side route module for handling logs, implementing an API endpoint to retrieve recent logs with user-specific filtering.

methods.name: GET /
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve recent logs specific to the authenticated user or global logs. Implements authentication and querying database for logs.

calls: query(`SELECT id, level, message, created_at, user_id FROM "Log" WHERE user_id IS NULL OR user_id=$1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 200`, [uid])
